```{r}
library(adegenet)

nuSSR <- adegenet::read.structure('../archivos_entrada/nuc_mod.stru',  onerowperind = F, n.ind = 211, n.loc = 10, col.lab = 1, col.pop = 2, col.others = F, row.marknames = 0)
```

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(hierfstat)

nu_hierfstat <- genind2hierfstat(nuSSR)
allelic.richness(nu_hierfstat)$Ar %>% colMeans()
sum_pop <- seppop(nuSSR) 


lapply(sum_pop,function(x)genind2hierfstat(x) %>% basic.stats(diploid = TRUE, digits = 2))
lapply(sum_pop,function(x)genind2hierfstat(x) %>% allelic.richness(diploid = TRUE))

```
